de.wwu.muggl.instructions.replaced.quick
Class LdcQuick

java.lang.Object
  de.wwu.muggl.instructions.general.GeneralInstruction
      de.wwu.muggl.instructions.general.GeneralInstructionWithOtherBytes
          de.wwu.muggl.instructions.replaced.quick.LdcQuick
All Implemented Interfaces:
JumpNever, Instruction, QuickInstruction
public class LdcQuick
extends GeneralInstructionWithOtherBytes
implements JumpNever, QuickInstruction

QuickInstruction for ldc, ldc_w and ldw2_w. It just pushes the priorly stored object onto the operand stack instead of fetching it from the constant pool.

Version:
1.0.0, 2010-03-10
Author:
Tim Majchrzak
